briefdescription.para: Evaluate the rover constraint (minimum distance between any two rovers)

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the satellite constraint (minimum distance between any two satellites)

memberdef.name: generate_walker

briefdescription.para: Generates a Walker constallation as a SatrecArray.

parameterdescription.para: number of satellites per plane
number of planes
spacing parameter (i.e. if 2 phasing repeats each 2 planes)
semi-major axis
eccentricity
inclination
argument of perigee
epoch

simplesect.para: SatrecArray satellites ready to be SGP4 propagated

briefdescription.para: Builds a networkx graph from the satellite positions.

detaileddescription.para: Links are weighted via a "QKD-inspired metric and only exist when motherships/constellation satellites/rovers have line-of-sight

parameterdescription.para: idx of the epoch in the time grid pos (numpy array 3xN): position vector of the satellites
number of satellites in the first Walker constellation
satellite quality indicator for each Walker constellation

simplesect.para: igraph nodes are motherships/Walker satellites/rovers; links are distances when there is LOS

briefdescription.para: Computes the average shortest path length between the source and destination partitions of nodes in the graph G (the source is assumed to be the motherships and the destination the rovers)

parameterdescription.para: the number of motherships (to be used as a negative index in G)
the number of rovers (to be used as a negative index in G)

simplesect.para: float average shortest path

briefdescription.para: Generates two Walker constellations according to specifications.

parameterdescription.para: chromosome describing the New Mars communications infrastructure

simplesect.para: SatrecArray Walker1 constellation satellites ready to be SGP4 propagated
SatrecArray Walker2 constellation satellites ready to be SGP4 propagated

briefdescription.para: Computes the position of the motherships over a predefined time grid.

parameterdescription.para: mothership satellites ready to be SGP4 propagated

simplesect.para: float, n_motherships x n_epochs x 3: mothership x, y, z positions

briefdescription.para: Construct cumulative position of Walker satellites, motherships and rovers.

parameterdescription.para: Walker1 constellation satellites ready to be SGP4 propagated
Walker2 constellation satellites ready to be SGP4 propagated pos_r (float, n_rovers x n_epochs x 3): rover x, y, z positions

simplesect.para: float, (S1xP1 + S2xP2 + n_motherships + n_rovers) x n_epochs x 3: overall position vector

memberdef.name: plot

briefdescription.para: Plot the full constellations with solution path and optional orbits.

parameterdescription.para: chromosome describing the communications network
mothership index denoting path source
rover index denoting path destination

index of the epoch in the predefined time grid lims (float, optional): plot limits. Defaults to 10000. ax (matplotlib 3D axis, optional): plot axis. dark_mode (bool, optional): dark background for plot (recommended)

simplesect.para: matplotlib the 3D plot axes
list indices of the graph nodes on the communications path (if one is found, otherwise [])

briefdescription.para: A Pygmo compatible UDP (User Defined Problem) representing the constellation design problem for SpOC 2023.

detaileddescription.para: Two Walker constellations are defined in a mixint chromosome: x=[a1,ei,i1,w1,eta1]+[a2,e2,i2,w2,eta2]+[S1,P1,F1]+[S2,P2,F2]+[r1,r2,r3,r4] The constellations must relay information between 7 motherships in orbit and 4 rovers on the surface of New Mars
